|manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=M4Y-XI-300 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XI-300 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=ConnectionPoint |default_ssid_regex=^ConnectionPoint$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth=00:02:A5 |default_ch= }} [http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/manualCategory?cc=us&lc=en&dlc=en&document=&product=218413 Manuals] The Getting Started Guide included with the unit shows the device with a Delta Networks MAC (00:30:AB). The board design and P/N clearly indicates that '''Delta Networks''' is indeed the OEM. :The board is highly similar to the [[IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)]] and the [[Netgear MR314]]. 10/100 LAN switch, 10 WAN "2976161003" is silkscreened on the board.
"D212517430306 5508002713 REV: 0" and "CP-2W" is printed on a label affixed to the LAN port casing. This device most likely uses a '''Marvell''' 88E6050 switch like the [[Netgear MR314]] and the [[IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)]]. The power adapter included with the unit is a AD48-1201200DU (12V, 1.2A). {{WiFiCert|W000580|05/13/2002}} ==Images== File:Compaq_CP-2W_board_top.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]]
